title: Brooks & Brompton celebrate British Cycling in Tokyo 2020 Olympic limited editions
content:
It may have been delayed by a year due to COVID, but British Cycling are now heading to the 2020 Olympics, and they’ll be cruising around Tokyo on special limited edition Brompton x Team GB folding bikes with roaring lion Brooks Cambium C17 saddles & Brompton messenger bags. The bikes are so limited that you’ll […]

The post Brooks & Brompton celebrate British Cycling in Tokyo 2020 Olympic limited editions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
